title: Infected, Special Edition
description: The world has changed. A werecat virus has altered the landscape, and as the only virus child who appears to be "normal", detective Roan McKichan finds himself in a weird position, not perfectly Human but not perfectly Infected either. Or is he even more than he realizes? With his partner and lover Paris Lehane (who's infected with the deadly tiger strain), Roan investigates crimes against and by infecteds, and tries to figure out what he is as he battles his own personal demons. A serial fiction in its original inception, this contains the first four books of the series (Infected, Prey, Bloodlines, & Life After Death), with some bonus "author's commentary".
author: Andrea Speed
